item.title: ubah compare at price jadi warna merah pada tema brooklyn
item.description: Snippets > product-grid-item.liquid ubah <span class="grid-product__price-wrap"> jadi <span class="grid-product__price-wrap {% if product.compare_at_price > product.price %}item_with_compareatprice{% endif %} "> Assets > theme.scss.liquid tambahkan .item_with_compareatprice .grid-product__price { color: #900; }

item.title: harga coret pada tema brooklyn
item.description: replace product-grid-item.liquid <!-- /snippets/product-grid-item.liquid --> {% unless grid_item_width %} {% assign grid_item_width = 'large--one-third medium--one-half' %} {% endunless %} {% unless width %} {%- assign width = 310 -%} {% endunless %} {% unless height %} {%- assign height = 415 -%} {% endunless %} {% assign on_sale = false %} {% if product.compare_at_price > product.price %} {% assign on_sale = true %} {% endif %} {% assign sold_out = true %} {% if product.

item.title: mengubah warna salah satu menu di shopify
menambahkan button pada halaman produk di shopify
item.description: product-template.liquid <button class="nama kelas"> <a href="masukan link" >Order via Whatsapp</a></button>

item.title: membuat halaman yang berdiri sendiri tanpa header dan footer di shopify
item.description: add new template page.alternate.liquid {% layout none %} {%- if settings.favicon != blank -%} <link rel="shortcut icon" href="{{ settings.favicon | img_url: '32x32' }}" type="image/png"> {%- endif -%} {{ page.content }} di halaman yang dibuat pilih template page.alternate
